properties.label: Width
properties.description: Game width expressed in pixel

properties.label: Height
properties.description: Game height expressed in pixel

properties.label: Scale Interpolation Desktop
properties.description: It enable or disable pixel interpolation on desktop.

properties.label: Scale Interpolation Mobile
properties.description: It enable or disable pixel interpolation on mobile devices.

properties.label: Max FPS
properties.description: This is the maximum frames per second rate.

properties.label: Audio
properties.description: This turns on/off the whole audio system

properties.label: Music
properties.description: This turns on/off only the background music

properties.label: Ads on new level
properties.description: This turns on/off ad screen when player completes each level.

properties.label: Ads on player death
properties.description: This turns on/off ad screen when player dies

properties.label: Ads page desktop
properties.description: This is the URL of the page shown on computers if Ads on death and/or Ads on new level are set to on.

properties.label: Ads page mobile
properties.description: This is the URL of the page shown on mobile devices if Ads on death and/or Ads on new level are set to on.

properties.label: In-game ads
properties.description: This turns on/off the banner inside the game.

properties.label: Mobile Controls
properties.description: You can control the game by swipung over the screen or by tapping on the side where you wish the character goes.

properties.label: First line text
properties.description: First line of the text shown in loading screen

properties.label: First line font size
properties.description: Font size of the first line of the text.

properties.label: First line color
properties.description: Color of first line expressed in hex value

properties.label: Second line text
properties.description: Second line of the text shown in loading screen

properties.label: Second line font size
properties.description: Font size of the second line of the text.

properties.label: Second line color
properties.description: Color of second line expressed in hex value

properties.label: Loading screen backgorund color
properties.description: Loading screen backgorund color expressed in hex value

properties.label: Progress bar color
properties.description: Progress bar in color loading screen expressed in hex value

properties.label: Game languages
properties.description: add your additional languages here. For esample 'ru','es', etc...

properties.label: Audio Toggle Button
properties.description: This turns on/off the Audio Toggle Button from showing in home screen.

properties.label: Full Screen Button
properties.description: This turns on/off the Full Screen Button from showing in home screen.

properties.label: Info Button
properties.description: This turns on/off the Info Button from showing in home screen.

properties.label: Leaderboard Button
properties.description: This turns on/off the Leaderboard Button from showing in home screen.

properties.label: How To Play Button
properties.description: This turns on/off the How To Play Button from showing in home screen.

properties.label: More Games Button
properties.description: This turns on/off the More Games Button from showing in home screen.

properties.label: More Games Link
properties.description: Url for 'More Games' button

properties.label: Leaderboard Server
properties.description: URL to the server side script that will receive the score data.

properties.label: iOS Rating URL
properties.description: URL for 'Rate this game' button if the game runs as ibrid app on iOS

properties.label: Android Rating URL
properties.description: RL for 'Rate this game' button if the game runs as ibrid app on Android

properties.label: Select Level Screen
properties.description: This enable or disable the select level screen.

properties.label: Submit Score Button
properties.description: Enable or disable the Submit Score Button from showing in Game Over screen.

properties.label: Keyboard With Numbers
properties.description: Enable or disable numbers in virtual keyboard when player enters his/her nickname.

properties.label: Player Speed
properties.description: Default speed of the player's sprite, when it's in normal play, expressed in pixel per seconds. This value may be overridden by editor settings.

properties.label: Enemies Speed
properties.description: Default enemies speed, when player is in normal play, expressed in pixel per seconds. This value may be overridden by editor settings.

properties.label: Player Velocity
properties.description: Player's sprite velocity during power-up time. This value may be overridden by editor settings.

properties.label: Player Velocity
properties.description: Enemies velocity during player's power up. This value may be overwritten by editor settings. This value may be overridden by editor settings.

properties.label: Dots Score
properties.description: The points given by collecting a dot.

properties.label: Dots Score
properties.description: The points given by collecting a power-up pill.

properties.label: Dots Score
properties.description: The points given by the killing any enemies during power-up.

properties.label: HUD Position
properties.description: You can set the HUD (score, lives, pause button) in the upper or in the lower side of the game viewport.

properties.label: Font strong
properties.description: In-game pause button on/off, if you turn on radar consider disabling this because radar have the pause button function too.

properties.label: Power Up Duration
properties.description: Duration in milliseconds of power-up time that is when the player eats a pill. A value of 10000 corresponds to 10 seconds.

properties.label: Power Down Alert
properties.description: When power-up time is ending, the enemy can play a specific animation for warning the player of that fact, this value sets how much time before the animation starts. Time is expressed in milliseconds.

properties.label: Power Up Kills Ememies
properties.description: Sets the ability of killing enemies during power up time.

properties.label: Power Up Invulnerability
properties.description: Sets player invulnerability from enemies on power up time.

properties.label: Action when Enemy Dies
properties.description: This sets what happen when an enemy dies: it can respawn on its original position or remove itself from the level.

properties.label: Enemy Respawn Time
properties.description: The time the enemy must waits before starting again if respawn on dead. It's the time expressed in milliseconds.

properties.label: Enemy hidden untill respawns.
properties.description: Keep enemy sprite hidden after its dead untill it respawns.

properties.label: Player Uses Teleport
properties.description: Teleports are special objects you can put on the map in order to move instantly the player or enemies from one point to another. This parameter allows or disallows player from using teleport objects.

properties.label: Enemies Use Teleport
properties.description: This parameter allows or disallows enemies from using teleport objects.

properties.label: Radar
properties.description: This parameter may be set true or false and it turn on or off the the radar screen on HUD.

properties.label: Radar Horizontal Position
properties.description: This is the horizontal position of the radar expressed in percentage of the screen width. 0:left, 1: right, 0.5:center.

properties.label: Radar Horizontal Position
properties.description: This is the vertical position of the radar expressed in percentage of the screen height. 0:up, 1: down, 0.5:middle.

properties.label: Enemy Respawn Time
properties.description: Width size of the radar screen expressed in pixels, the height will be calculated according the map size.

properties.label: Player Standing Up
properties.description: This animation is used when player stuck on a wall when it's in up direction.

properties.label: Player Standing Down
properties.description: This animation is used when player stuck on a wall when it's in down direction.

properties.label: Player Standing Right
properties.description: This animation is used when player stuck on a wall when it's in right direction.

properties.label: Player Standing Left
properties.description: This animation is used when player stuck on a wall when it's in left direction.

properties.label: Player Going Up
properties.description: This animation are used on player when is in normal mode and it's walking in up direction.

properties.label: Player Going Down
properties.description: This animation are used on player when is in normal mode and it's walking in down direction.

properties.label: Player Going Right
properties.description: This animation are used on player when is in normal mode and it's walking in right direction.

properties.label: Player Going Left
properties.description: This animation are used on player when is in normal mode and it's walking in left direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Up
properties.description: This animation is used on player when is in power-up mode and stuck on a wall in up direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Down
properties.description: This animation is used on player when is in power-up mode and stuck on a wall in down direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Right
properties.description: This animation is used on player when is in power-up mode and stuck on a wall in right direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Left
properties.description: This animation is used on player when is in power-up mode and stuck on a wall in left direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Up
properties.description: This animation are used on player when is in power-up mode and it's walking in up direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Down
properties.description: This animations are used on player when is in power-up mode and it's walking in down direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Right
properties.description: This animations are used on player when is in power-up mode and it's walking in right direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Up Standing Left
properties.description: This animations are used on player when is in power-up mode and it's walking in left direction. If you wish maintain the same player appearance as in normal mode, set the same values of the normal ones.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Standing Up
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and character is standing in up direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Standing Down
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and character is standing in down direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Standing Right
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and character is standing in right direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Standing Left
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and character is standing in left direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Going Up
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and character is going in up direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Going Down
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending in down direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Going Right
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending in right direction.

properties.label: Player Power-Down Going Left
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending in left direction.

properties.label: background of main menu animations
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending in left direction.

properties.label: background of main menu animations
properties.description: This animation is used as a warn when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending in left direction.

properties.label: Player Victory
properties.description: This animation is performed on player when a level is completed.

properties.label: Player Dying
properties.description: This animation is performed when the player dies. Please keep a long trail with the last frame, otherwise, you will see this animation looping.

properties.label: Enemy Going Up
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and enemy is going in up direction.

properties.label: Enemy Going Down
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and enemy is going in down direction.

properties.label: Enemy Going Right
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and enemy is going in right direction.

properties.label: Enemy Going Left
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and enemy is going in left direction.

properties.label: Enemy Going Up
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy is chasing the player in up direction.

properties.label: Enemy Going Down
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy is chasing the player in down direction.

properties.label: Enemy Going Right
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy is chasing the player in right direction.

properties.label: Enemy Going Left
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy is chasing the player in left direction.

properties.label: Enemy Bite Up
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy captures the player in up direction.

properties.label: Enemy Bite Down
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy captures the player in down direction.

properties.label: Enemy Bite Right
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy captures the player in right direction.

properties.label: Enemy Bite Left
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in normal mode and the enemy captures the player in left direction.

properties.label: Enemy Scared Up
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and enemy flees in up direction.

properties.label: Enemy Scared Down
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and enemy flees in down direction.

properties.label: Enemy Scared Right
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and enemy flees in right direction.

properties.label: Enemy Scared Left
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and enemy flees in left direction.

properties.label: Enemy Power-Down Up
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and enemy is going in up direction.

properties.label: Enemy Power-Down Down
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and enemy is going in down direction.

properties.label: Enemy Power-Down Right
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and enemy is going in right direction.

properties.label: Enemy Power-Down Left
properties.description: This animation is used on enemies when player is in power-up and the power-up time is near ending and enemy is going in left direction.

properties.label: Enemy Dies
properties.description: This animation is used when enemy dies.

properties.label: Enemy Respawn
properties.description: his animation is used when enemy respawn.

properties.label: Coin Animation Loop
properties.description: This animation is for the coins the player have to pick up in order to complete the level.

properties.label: Coin Animation Pickup
properties.description: This animation is performed by a coin when it's collected by the player. If you don't needs this animation you can keep this list empty []

properties.label: Pill Animation Loop
properties.description: This animation is for the power-up pills the player can eat.

properties.label: Pill Animation Pickup
properties.description: This animation is performed by a pill when it's eaten by the player. If you don't needs this animation you can keep this list empty []

properties.label: Levels Files
properties.description: The value of this parameter is the list of the level files. When all the levels are completed then the sequence starts again from the first but the levels counter will continue increasing during the game. For example, if you sets a total of 4 levels, when the player compete the fourth level, it will be loaded the level one as the following level but it will be shown as level five. You can design your own levels by loading one of the provided tmx file, extending it and saving it with a new name.

properties.label: Enemies Graphic Files
properties.description: This is the list of animation sheets files for game sprites. You can substitute this files with your custom made sprites. Do not change the name of this files because it's used as reference by the game engine.

properties.label: Map Graphic Files
properties.description: This is the list of graphic files used in level maps. In your own levels you may have used different file names or more than one tile map, if so, make changes here accordingly.
